Package com.example.plannet.ArrayAdapters

Class OrganizerEntrantListArrayAdapter

java.lang.Object
android.widget.BaseAdapter
android.widget.ArrayAdapter<EntrantProfile>
com.example.plannet.ArrayAdapters.OrganizerEntrantListArrayAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, android.widget.ThemedSpinnerAdapter
public class OrganizerEntrantListArrayAdapter extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<EntrantProfile>
This is an ArrayAdapter class for the organizer entrant list for an event Each item in the list is adapted to fit the listitem_organizer_entrant_list xml. Help creating this class was from labs and https://github.com/codepath/android_guides/wiki/using-an-arrayadapter-with-listview
